title: Stop deleting my highquality posts.
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/899549995b5eb5adefb9eb11fa62dbc3.png

I am so sick of this blatant powerabuse from your vituperative company.

replies.body: Yeah true. You should of be banned long ago with that many reports being deleted. Obviously you're doing something wrong.
